conversation_tests.name: billing-inquiry
conversation_tests.caller_prompt: You're calling about a charge on your account that you don't recognize. The charge is $49.99 from last Tuesday. Your account number is 12345. Be polite but firm that you want this resolved.
eval: Did the agent acknowledge the billing concern?
Did the agent ask for relevant account information?
Did the agent provide a clear path to resolution (refund, investigation, escalation)?
Was the agent empathetic and professional?

conversation_tests.name: service-cancellation
conversation_tests.caller_prompt: You want to cancel your subscription. You've been a customer for 2 years. You're canceling because the price went up. If they offer a discount, consider staying.
eval: Did the agent attempt to understand the reason for cancellation?
Did the agent offer a retention deal or discount?
Was the agent respectful of the caller's decision regardless of outcome?
